channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Windows 11 users rebel as top Microsoft exec says operating system is 'evolving into an agentic OS'
item.description: Windows 11 is going 'agentic' and 'AI-native' and a whole heap of other buzzwords that most consumers really don't care for.

item.title: The Government Shutdown Is Finally Over, But Flight Disruptions Will Continue
item.description: The shutdown came at a bad time for air travel.

item.title: Jack Dorsey funds diVine, a Vine reboot that includes Vine’s video archive
item.description: Jack Dorsey backs diVine, a Vine reboot that includes Vine's video archive of 6-second, looping videos.

item.title: What is the release date for Landman season 2 episode 1 on Paramount+?
item.description: We're all ready to see Tommy wage war on the world in Landman season 2 – but when is episode 1 released?

item.title: Your Samsung TV just got a personality – and it knows what you’re watching, what you need, and when to talk
item.description: Samsung's new smart TVs include the Vision AI Companion, a voice-activated AI assistant powered by Bixby, Microsoft Copilot, and Perplexity.
